name: Far From Normal (Snowfall)
description:
This game only works with controllers.

A small, fun couch game where you get to try and defeat your friends for the spotlight of being THE sacrifice for the elder gods, all whilst uni-cycling as different cat based characters.

It started as a Create jam project, (A big thank you to the original team), and continued as a 2-people operation to finish it up to a shippable level.

*Edit: A link to the original project https://octohatgames.itch.io/far-from-normal

It was a learning project.

Gameplay is about 5 minutes, and then whatever you make of it by replaying.
